intro: Astraea saxicola, commonly known as the rock astraea, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. This plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and green. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in mountainous regions. Astraea saxicola is a perennial herb that prefers full sun to partial shade.
